name: PANLAR 2023 - 25th Pan American Congress of Rheumatology
content: PANLAR is a unique congress in its design, carefully planned to foster an environment in which basic science, research, and clinical practice can be discussed broadly and deeply, taking into account the very diverse realities of the different countries of the Americas. PANLAR 2023 is being prepared with great care and attention. The PANLAR Scientific Committee and the PANLAR Science and Education Committee are designing an exceptional, innovative and challenging scientific program, which follows the tradition of the great events that preceded us, but with many innovations added. Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/1561721-1?pid=4868 Time: 10:00 - 15:00 Prices: Rheumatologists: USD 500.00, Professionals related to Rheumatology: USD 500.00, Graduates in Physical, Occupational or Nursing Therapy: USD 250.00, Residents and Students: USD 50.00 Venue details: Windsor Oceanico, 129 Rua Martinho de Mesquita, Barra da Tijuca, Rio de Janeiro, 22620-220, Brazil
organizers: PANLAR - PanAmercan League of Association of Rheumatology
